title: Bridgit
brief_description: The 32 minute work by Scottish artist Charlotte Prodger won the 2018 Turner Prize, and explores themes of class, gender, sexuality and neolithic goddesses.

constellations_other.name: A handheld aesthetic
constellations_other.description: Looking at the use of handycams and other consumer level devices in moving image works.

description: The 32 minute work by Scottish artist Charlotte Prodger won the 2018 Turner Prize, and explores themes of class, gender, sexuality and neolithic goddesses.
